translations: n.[航][军]轰炸机；喷射机；扔炸弹的人（bomber 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: They took out two enemy bombers.
sentences.translation: 他们摧毁了敌人的两架轰炸机。

sentences.sentence: Our bombers have knocked out the mobile launchers.
sentences.translation: 我们的轰炸机已经破坏了那些移动发射台。

sentences.sentence: Our anti-aircraft guns accounted for five enemy bombers.
sentences.translation: 我们的高射炮击落了五架敌人的轰炸机。
